data.actual_result: Emoji Modal appears next to the top message Add Reaction button causing it to go partly or fully out of sight if opened on a long message
data.expected_result: Emoji Modal opens where you initially right-clicked
data.short_description: Emoji modal opened through right-click Add Reaction button always appears next to the top message Add Reaction button causing it to go out of view on long messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a long message (One long enough to make the Options Menu on the message appear out of sight) - Right-click so the contextual menu appears- Open the Add Emoji list in the contextual menu- Scroll down to the "Other Emoji" option.- Select it.
